# File gm_plugin/layer.rb, line 54
      def initialize(options = {})
        @opacity = options[:opacity] || 1.0
        @zoom_range = options[:zoom_range] || (0..17)
        @copyright = options[:copyright] || {'prefix' => '', 'copyright_texts' => [""]}
        @format = (options[:format] || "png").to_s
      end
